name: Jigsaw Puzzle Bug
description:
We love jigsaw puzzles! That's why we set out to build the best jigsaw puzzle app.

It all starts with our photos. Amazing puzzles come from amazing photos. We select the very best pictures from professional photographers around the world.

We artfully hand-crafted four different puzzle cut styles to provide the feel of real jigsaws. Our team of programmers made it possible for you to have a unique puzzle every time you play.

Puzzles were meant for everyone to enjoy. Your kids and grandkids will love playing our 4, 6, and 12 piece cuts. You'll enjoy puzzles up to 80 pieces on your iPhone and up to 300 pieces on your iPad. We offer a wide range of photos, cuts and styles for every mood and skill level.

Jigsaws should be enjoyed, not interrupted by ads. Jigsaw Bug proudly features no third-party advertisements.


GET IN TOUCH

We want you to have the best puzzle experience possible! If you ever have any questions or suggestions, please contact us at http://www.jigsawbug.com/contact/. We always love hearing from our players.

Thanks for downloading Jigsaw Bug. Happy puzzling!
